attributes.action: Stop the six energy companies ripping people off with gas and electricity prices
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Wholesale gas prices have dropped to the same level of two years ago so why are our gas and electricity bills still high? Why is Ofgem powerless to do anything and if so why are they still operating?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
